Text.Page: Ah, are you a federation soldier? Just...can you just end this?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What happened to you?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Everyone just...it was business as usual, and then everyone just starting losing their minds. I can't even explain it.

They killed...they killed everyone in our village. Please, get rid of them before they do worse. Target the {@linkcreature:19#4002#Lokain cleavers} and {@linkcreature:19#4001#Lokian rippers}. Bring me something tangible so I can be sure they're really gone.

Thank you. This...it brings me peace.

Please take this. It's all I have.
Please...I don't have much time, and I just...I need a moment of peace before I go.
